vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
Lotto.cash (patch_13.sol#89-109) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- winner.transfer(subpot) (patch_13.sol#106)

vulnerability_findings.name: deprecated-standards
vulnerability_findings.message:
Deprecated standard detected @ patch_13.sol#112:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
